channel.title: Development on GEOS
channel.description: Recent content in Development on GEOS

item.title: Testing
item.description: Testing Tools Testing executables are in bin Unit testing Individual test classes within the test_geos_unit suite can be run by calling the test_geos_unit executable. The test source files are under the test/unit directory. The test group names are in the group declaration in each XXXTest.cpp file . $ bin/test_geos_unit # Run all tests $ bin/test_geos_unit capi::GEOSNode # Run a single group of tests Individual tests within a test class can be run by specifying the test number:

item.title: CI Status
item.description: CI main 3.10 3.9 3.8 3.7 GitHub GitLab Azure Debbie Winnie Dronie Bessie Bessie32 Berrie Berrie64 Runners GitHub - Ubuntu various, Windows various, CMake GitLab - Debian 8.
